DOC.brief_summary: The rationale of this study is to conduct a summative (i.e., validation) usability test of Ciprofloxacin Dry Powder for Inhalation (DPI) and the associated Instructions for Use.
DOC.brief_title: Summative Usability Study of Ciprofloxacin Dry Powder for Inhalation Using Placebo
